components/reviews/review-modal:
{{lang 'product.reviews.write_review'}}

{{#if product.reviews.throttleToken}} {{/if}} {{!-- Clickable Stars --}}
{{lang 'product.reviews.rating_label'}}
{{!-- Name --}} {{> core/forms/common/text label=(lang 'product.reviews.form.name') name="revfromname" id="revfromname" required="true" prefill=(lang 'product.reviews.form.name')}} {{!-- Email --}} {{> core/forms/common/email label=(lang 'product.reviews.form.email') name="email" id="rating-email" required="true" prefill=(lang 'product.reviews.form.email')}} {{!-- Subject --}} {{> core/forms/common/text label=(lang 'product.reviews.form.subject') name="revtitle" id="rating-title" required="true" prefill=(lang 'product.reviews.form.subject')}} {{!-- Comments --}} {{> core/forms/common/multiline label=(lang 'product.reviews.form.comments') name="revtext" id="rating-comment" required="true" rows=6 prefill=(lang 'product.reviews.form.comments')}} {{!-- Recaptcha V2 --}} {{{product.reviews.recaptcha.markup}}}
components/header/nav-mobile-toggle:
<button class="nav-mobile-toggle" data-nav-mobile-toggle>
   <svg class="nav-mobile-icon" title="Open mobile menu" role="img">
    <use xlink:href="#icon-hamburger"></use>
  </svg>
</button>
components/branding:
{{#if settings.store_logo.image.data}} {{else}}

{{settings.store_logo.title}}

{{/if}}
components/search-form:
{{{snippet 'forms_search'}}}
<form class="search-form" action="{{urls.search}}" data-search-form>
  <button type="submit" class="search-submit">
    <svg class="search-icon" title="{{lang 'header.search'}}" role="img">
      <use xlink:href="#icon-search"></use>
    </svg>
  </button>
  <input class="search-input form-input"
         name="search_query"
         placeholder="{{lang 'header.search'}}"
         type="text"
         autocomplete="off"
         data-search-input
         data-search-url="{{urls.search}}"
         aria-label="{{lang 'header.search'}}"
  >

  <button class="search-close" data-search-close>
    <svg class="search-close-icon" title="Close Search" role="img">
      <use xlink:href="#icon-close"></use>
    </svg>
  </button>
</form>
components/header/customer-links: {{#if settings.account_creation_enabled}} {{#if customer}} {{lang 'header.account'}} - {{lang 'header.log_out'}} {{else}} {{lang 'header.log_in'}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
components/sidebar/nav-mobile-close:
<button class="nav-mobile-close" data-nav-mobile-toggle>
  <svg class="nav-mobile-icon-close" title="Close mobile menu" role="img">
    <use xlink:href="#icon-close"></use>
  </svg>
</button>
components/category/filters:
{{> components/faceted-search/index
  sort=pagination.category.sort
  subcategories=category.subcategories
  clear_url=category.url
  facets_enabled=category.faceted_search_enabled
  facets=category.facets
  facets_selected=category.selected
  shop_by_price=category.shop_by_price
  shop_by_brand=shop_by_brand
}}
components/brand/filters:
{{> components/faceted-search/index
  sort=pagination.brand.sort
  clear_url=brand.url
  facets_enabled=brand.faceted_search_enabled
  facets=brand.facets
  facets_selected=brand.selected
  shop_by_price=brand.shop_by_price
  shop_by_brand=shop_by_brand
}}
